comprehensive_overview: Relion is a stand-alone computer program that employs an empirical Bayesian approach to refinement of (multiple) 3D reconstructions or 2D class averages in electron cryo-microscopy (cryo-EM).
core_features: Key features of Relion include particle extraction, 2D and 3D classification, image processing, refinement, and reconstruction. It is widely used for high-resolution structure determination of macromolecular complexes.
